item.title: Installing a Canon 350D on Windows 7 x64
item.description: I have a Canon 350D which I was struggling to download the photos from onto the computer since upgrading it to Windows 7 64-bit. I’d looked around for drivers, but Canon haven’t made any 64-bit drivers for that camera (we have had it nearly 8 years) so I was wondering how I’d get around the problem. I eventually came across the site of someone else in the same situation who has blogged the following:
